name: Homework io (opoly)
description:
HOMEWORK io IS A MATH-FRIENDLY GAME! BUY AND SELL PROPERTIES AS YOU LEARN. ADD AND SUBTRACT YOUR WAY AROUND THE HOMEWORK IO BOARD AS YOU PLAY. HAVE FUN AND PLAY HARD!

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
